Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot ELPH 115 16 MP Digital camera (blue)
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Wattles
Reviews.Content: I really like my camera.  I have had an ELPH Canon for 5 years before this on and that is why I got this one.  I was surprised there was no CD-ROM for installation but went to the web site and downloaded  It is small Compact and takes great pictures.  I have to go thru my PDF manual I downloaded to find out more things about it.  Taking it to Hawaii later this months for great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Kristy Parish
Reviews.Content: This camera is perfect for someone on the go. It comes with its own case and I can just drop it in my purse and go! The pictures are good quality too. I would highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Small but Powerful
Reviews.Author: Tammy Christensen "TJ"
Reviews.Content: With the exception of the SD card, I have no complaints. Those are cheap so just order a couple better brands if you buy this camera. The pictures are excellent quality. There's a lot of different settings for different effects. The auto actually adjusts for night shots without having to change anything. I charged the battery before I went on vacation for a week, took almost 500 pictures plus 4-5 videos and been taking pictures and video since I've been home and the battery only lost 2 bars. Hooked up to my PC with no issues and works great with my Kodak photo printer. It is small, the case is padded a bit and soft inside. I dropped it once on the pavement and no dents, no damage. There's still a lot I haven't discovered with it so missed a few things.Basically, if you want a compact camera that takes great shots and does so much more, buy it, I highly recommend this Canon.

Reviews.Title: Happy!
Reviews.Author: Donna Hutchins
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with this purchase.  Is small and lightweight and seems to take clear, bright pictures.  Good deal on it!

Reviews.Title: A hit!
Reviews.Author: Mom27
Reviews.Content: This camera is perfect for my preteen .Easy to navigate. Light & compact.I scored big time with this gift!

Reviews.Title: Good camera because of size & quality
Reviews.Author: Susan E Taylor
Reviews.Content: But where's the cute cover that's pictured here!?! All it came with was a boring black case.  And the case doesn't fit extra batteries or sd card!The camera takes good quality photos and easy video.  I've had several of these and they are all good.  This one doesn't eat battery power like the  bigger Canon. But you still need to carry a spare.

Reviews.Title: Camera Kit Great BUT...
Reviews.Author: Sue Hail
Reviews.Content: They don't include an INSTRUCTION MANUAL for it anymore! (I bought a kit just like this in pink a few years ago and it was stolen.(I had the MANUAL in the case for reference.) The charger was plugged in at home from charging the extra battery so they didn't get THAT at least!Ha! :/ )Actually, IT came with a manual in English AND Spanish! This one? Just a sheet telling you how to install the battery, memory card, you know, the BASICS, and at the top of this sheet is their website where you have to DOWNLOAD IT AND PRINT IT YOURSELF! (OK seems like a small thing these days but I want a manual I can carry. On the upside, the manuals are available in a plethora of languages.) Also, I (obviously naively) thought in these days of social networking the USB cable you need to transfer your pics onto your computer would be included. Nope. However, you can conveniently buy at the Canon website (provided to get your manual) for $19.95 PLUS S & H! OR you can use this link to get the same thing (but NOT made by Canon) right here at Amazon for $5.75 + 4.99 S & H! PLUS it has a 5 star satisfaction rating! dCables Canon PowerShot ELPH 115 IS USB Cable - USB Computer Cord for PowerShot ELPH 115 ISIf you have one of these cameras, they are amazing, aren't they? BTW, the case in this kit is nicer than the pink one.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't take very good pictures...
Reviews.Author: Kathie Robson
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for.  While this is camera is a good price, it doesn't take very good quality pictures and it distortes the colors and makes things more yellow. We returned it for a more expensive Canon.

Reviews.Title: Great size, but picture quality is alright
Reviews.Author: Jasmine Brinson "Jas"
Reviews.Content: I have a dslr, Canon Rebel t3i, and I love it but sometimes it's just too bulky to bring with me when I'm not taking professional pictures. I also have a samsung galaxy 3 phone that I had been using to take pictures at spur of the moment occasions. I was looking for a small camera that still had good resolution/image quality for when I'm on the go with my kids or family. I thought this would fit the bill. It came quickly and packaged well. Out of the box the battery does need to be charged overnight before using. Once it was charged and ready to go, I found the camera to be easy to hold and use. The size is just right for on the go. I got it in blue and was pleased with the color and the case that it came with. It fit perfect in my smaller purses and the side pocket of my diaper bag. What did it for me though was the picture quality. I expected more from Canon, having owned an older version of the Canon PowerShot. For 16 MP, the image quality is comparable to that of my Samsung Galaxy 3 phone. I took pictures at a family birthday party indoors with the camera and my phone and could not tell a difference in the quality with both indoor and outdoor lighting. Perhaps it may be because I've gotten spoiled with my dslr and I expect crisp images when I take pictures, especially with Canon's image stabilizer. If you're looking images with a high resolution that you could print enlargements with, this camera will do the job, but don't expect superior quality in those images. In the end, I returned the camera and I'm going to stick with my camera phone in the mean time.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price!
Reviews.Author: Bonnee Pierson
Reviews.Content: I needed a camera to take pictures of my products for sale online and I was amazed at the quality of the photos as well as how easy it is to carry and use.  My oldest is getting married in June and this camera will be hanging from my wrist, unobtrusive and welcome, through the ceremony and reception.  Definitely a product where you get more bang for your buck than I've seen in a long time.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: James D. Brady
Reviews.Content: this product was highly recommended. when i received it , i was not disappointed it was very easy to use. i love it..

Reviews.Title: Powershot camera
Reviews.Author: Patricia M. Herzog
Reviews.Content: I am still learning about this.  My hands are arthritic so it has taken me a little longer and the buttons are tiny. Screen is good size, easy to use and put it on a small tripod.  I believe that I will be pleased and this is my 2nd powershot,

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!
Reviews.Author: ethel
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my daughter's b-day.  She loves it and got great shots.Also the case really is cool and original!!!

Reviews.Title: Fun camera
Reviews.Author: Helga M. Strong
Reviews.Content: This is a fun little camera, handy to carry in a purse. The quality of the pictures is quite good, but of course it won't compare to a serious camera with telephoto lens etc.  The blue color is a little odd, but I bought it on sale.

Reviews.Title: Great compact camera!
Reviews.Author: D W Lange
Reviews.Content: Its Simple to use, Compact, Great clarity! We love it, all in one package! Thanks for getting it right Canon!

Reviews.Title: Why I love my Canon PowerShot ELPH115
Reviews.Author: Edward Vitse
Reviews.Content: It met all my expectations. Small, compact, easy to carry. Quality pictures. Affordable,  easy to understand instructions. Kit contained everything.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: Janet Shafer
Reviews.Content: great camera! love the color, nice that it came with a pouch and sd card! takes great pictures! just what I was looking for!

Reviews.Title: So far, I love it, have only had about 3 weeks
Reviews.Author: Jan Exists
Reviews.Content: Wonderful size, tiny, easily fits in pocket (my smart phone is too big).  Intuitive operation, idiot proof camera, does great close-ups, crisp pictures, great videos.  I took pictures of kids, hardly any blurred ones.  I did them on automatic, and to me it is easier to just crop the pictures to get a close up then trying to zoom in and frame it in right.  That way avoid the blurs.  I took great close-ups of flowers with the macro function.  Zoom is a bit trickier, I need to use tripod maybe.  I took videos, they turned out pretty good, sound quality surprisingly good.  I just downloaded the on-line manual (not included with camera).  So now I am going to figure out how to do various effects, and can try the more manual settings too.  So far seems to have great battery life.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 115 16 MP
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I do not like this camera because it is too slow.  Because it's small, inexpensive & fairly easy to use it would be a good starter camera for a child.  When you take a picture you have to count to 10 before it "takes" (processes?)  It is terribly slow.

Reviews.Title: not great
Reviews.Author: Courtnee C.
Reviews.Content: I had a canon sd 1100 prior and i needed a new little camera instead of carrying my EOS around everywhere. I got this for mothers day and have used it maybe 4 times. The quality is horrible and now its reading a memory card error. Since its past my 30 days I cannot return this to the store. What happened canon???? I used to love you, but now im rethinking it.

Reviews.Title: OF COURSE IT IS A CANON..........
Reviews.Author: M. Velasquez "Curioso"
Reviews.Content: ALL THE ELPH TYPE OF CAMERA HAVE ALWAYS WORKED WELL FOR ME......  I HAD A CANON HELPH BUT IT WAS STOLEN, SO THIS IS A REPLACEMENT.....AND WORKS WELL  I REALLY LOVE IT

Reviews.Title: Have to return it.
Reviews.Author: George Morales
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife as a Mothers Day gift and the first time she used it an error message appeared.  We could not record my daughters recital and its just passed Amazon's 30 day refund date.  Contacted Canon and I have to return it to be serviced, this is why I always buy Nokia.

ProductInfo.Features:
16.0 Megapixel Image Sensor with DIGIC 4 Image Processor for exceptional performance.
8x Optical Zoom with 28mm Wide-Angle lens delivers stunning images and allows you to capture more in your frame.
Smart AUTO intelligently selects the proper camera settings based on 32 predefined shooting situations for capturing spectacular images with ease.
Shoot brilliant 720p HD video with a dedicated movie button.
Bundle includes ELPH 115, 8 GB Class A Memory Card & Camera Case
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 115 16 MP Digital Camera Kit (Blue)
